messages.messageBody:
We're in Ontario, but I think there might be some Montreal
unschoolers. When I was originally looking for the Toronto Unschooling
Conference details I saw a notice for the conference on the following
site: www.montrealhomelearners.ca. Maybe you could check out that
group/page.

Good luck,

Kimberlee
